turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like you to order for me 3 large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What do you want for the large pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one to be a MeatZZa, the next one to be Pacific Veggie and the last one a cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of bread do you want for the pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Deep dish would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any appetizers with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, get me an order of buffalo wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Should I get ranch with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, we will go with blue cheese this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you also want a couple of salads.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, my family would love that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Anything else? Drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please get me 2 liter ginger ale and coke.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any sandwiches this time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, I think we are all sandwiched out from last time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For the pizzas, do you want extra cheese?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that would be great on the cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. So to repeat the order back to you, you want 2 2 liter sodas, ginger ale and coke, an order of buffalo wings with ranch dipping sauce, 3 large deep dish pizzas with MeatZZa, Pacific Veggie and extra cheese pizza, and 2 salads.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it three salads.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 cesaer salads?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm. Maybe I will also get a sandwich for night time snack.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What sandwich would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the Chicken Parm sandwich.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With the usual?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome.
